h1_title: How to Find All Buddha's Eyes Locations and Unlock Secret Boss
h2_title: How to Use the Buddha’s Eyeballs to Unlock the Secret Boss
content: When you have all 6 of the Budda Eyes, the prompt for Deliver will appear. Doing so will enter the Buddha’s Eyeballs into the rock and a secret boss Shigandang will appear.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Find_All_Buddha's_Eyes_Locations_and_Unlock_Secret_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Find All Buddha's Eyes Locations and Unlock Secret Boss', specifically from the subsection 'How to Use the Buddha’s Eyeballs to Unlock the Secret Boss'.
The content is as follows:
When you have all 6 of the Budda Eyes, the prompt for Deliver will appear. Doing so will enter the Buddha’s Eyeballs into the rock and a secret boss Shigandang will appear.
